title: European agency finds AstraZeneca shot can cause rare blood clots but benefits outweigh risk
content:
1. European agency finds AstraZeneca shot can cause rare blood clots but benefits outweigh risk  CNN
  2. "Clear link between AstraZeneca and rare blood clots" | DW News  DW News
  3. EU agency to address AZ safety as countries battle virus surges  Medical Xpress
  4. AstraZeneca vaccine trial in children halted as blood clot link investigated  FRANCE 24 English
  5. Clear link between AstraZeneca vaccine and rare blood clots in brain, EMA official tells paper  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 欧州機関がアストラゼネカ社の注射剤が稀な血栓を引き起こす可能性があるが、利点がリスクを上回ると判断
欧洲机构发现阿斯利康针剂可导致罕见的血栓，但益处大于风险。
歐洲機構發現阿斯利康針劑可導致罕見的血栓，但益處大於風險。
